skill.name: learn-on
skill.description: Enable continuous learning mode for automatic insight extraction
skill.summary: Enable continuous learning mode for automatic insight extraction
skill.author: 0xrdan

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Only accesses local state file within skill's own directory. No network calls, no command execution, no external dependencies.

content.value_statement: Manually triggering insight extraction during long sessions is easy to forget. This skill activates automatic learning mode where insights are captured every 10 queries or 30 minutes without manual intervention.
actual_capabilities: Enables continuous learning mode for automatic insight extraction
Reads and updates knowledge/state.json to track learning state
Sets extraction trigger thresholds (10 queries or 30 minutes)
Confirms activation status with clear output to user
Persists learning mode across session until disabled or session ends
limitations: Only operates within the skill's own knowledge directory
Does not extract insights itselfâ€”only enables the automatic trigger
Resets on new sessionsâ€”must be re-enabled each session
Does not modify or read the actual learning content files

use_cases.title: Capture Patterns Automatically
use_cases.description: Document code patterns and solutions as you work without breaking flow or remembering to run extraction commands.

use_cases.title: Track Insights Over Time
use_cases.description: Build a knowledge base of learnings automatically during extended sessions with clients or complex projects.

use_cases.title: Document Discoveries Continuously
use_cases.description: Automatically capture research insights and decisions as they emerge during long investigation sessions.

prompt_templates.title: Check Status
prompt_templates.prompt: What is the current learning mode status

output: Extraction will trigger automatically: every 10 queries or every 30 minutes of activity.
Insights will be saved to knowledge/learnings/patterns.md, quirks.md, and decisions.md.
Use /learn-off to disable, or /learn for manual extraction.

best_practices: Enable learning mode at the start of long working sessions to capture the most insights.
Combine with /learn for manual extraction when you reach a natural stopping point.
Use /knowledge to verify learning status before assuming automatic extraction is active.
anti_patterns: Enabling learning mode mid-session and expecting retroactive capture of earlier insights.
Assuming learning mode persists across separate sessionsâ€”it resets on new sessions.
Disabling learning mode expecting automatic extraction to continueâ€”it stops immediately.

faq.question: Does learning mode persist across Claude restarts?
faq.answer: No. Learning mode resets when Claude restarts or begins a new session. Re-enable it each session.

faq.question: What triggers automatic insight extraction?
faq.answer: Automatic extraction triggers after 10 queries or 30 minutes of continuous activity, whichever comes first.

faq.question: Can I use manual extraction while learning mode is active?
faq.answer: Yes. You can run /learn at any time for manual extraction. This does not disable automatic mode.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads and writes to its own local state file within the skill directory. No external access.

faq.question: Why are my insights not appearing in the knowledge base?
faq.answer: This skill enables automatic triggers but does not perform extraction itself. Ensure /learn-on ran successfully and thresholds were reached.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual /learn command?
faq.answer: /learn performs immediate extraction. This skill enables automatic extraction at set intervals without manual intervention during sessions.
